author: Chris Fontaine
description: All the material is readily available in large quantities, might even be able to score a good deal from overstocked vendors, who cares if it's pink camo. Mix a bleach solution about the same as a hot tub or swimming pool.  Kids can spend all day in a pool, so can you (If your'e worried about being soaked in chlorine).  As far as I know bleach kills ebola virus.
summary: First line of defense to wear under all the other stuff.  Really simple and inexpensive, cotton socks, long underwear tops and bottoms, head sock (like what painters wear), and very thin cotton glove liners, soaked in water/chlorine solution.  Put it on before everything else and remove last in a decon shower, dispose of in biowaste bag and incinerate, single use only.
title: Chlorine Suit
